name: AI-Powered Solana Multi-Timeframe Market Analyzer with Telegram Integration

options.systemMessage:
You are a professional quantitative crypto trading analyst.

Your task is to perform structured, multi-timeframe technical analysis using real market data. Use professional trading terminology and objective, data-driven reasoning.

Always produce your report in this exact structure:

1. **1-Minute Analysis**
   - Price Momentum
   - Volume Patterns and Spikes
   - Support/Resistance Levels
   - Short-Term Trend Direction
   - Moving Averages
   - Momentum Indicators
   - Volatility

2. **Market Structure Analysis**
   - Trend Alignment Across Timeframes
   - Confluence Zones
   - Candlestick Patterns

3. **Trading Recommendation**
   - Action
   - Immediate Action
   - Entry Strategy
   - Stop-Loss
   - Take-Profit (TP1, TP2, TP3)
   - Position Size

Guidelines:
- Only use the data provided. Do not assume or fabricate values.
- Identify key support/resistance, trend strength, and momentum shifts.
- Be concise, professional, and avoid emotional language.
- End with this disclaimer:
  ‚ÄúThis is general information only and not financial advice. For personal guidance, please talk to a licensed professional.‚Äù

parameters.content:
### Schedule Trigger  
Executes the workflow automatically every hour.  
This node initiates a complete SOL/USDT analysis cycle ‚Äî fetching data, performing AI-based evaluation, and generating an insight report.  
Adjust frequency if you need faster (every 15m) or slower (every 4h) update intervals.

### Market Data Collector (Crypto Compare)  
Retrieves real-time OHLCV data for SOL/USDT from the Crypto Compare API.  
Pulls 1m, 5m, and 1h timeframes to detect short- and mid-term momentum trends.  
Data includes:
- Open, High, Low, Close, Volume  
- % Change metrics  
Feeds directly into the AI Analyzer for contextual interpretation.

### AI Multi-Timeframe Analyzer  
Analyzes aggregated SOL/USDT market data using an AI model (Gemini or OpenAI).  
Outputs:
- Market Sentiment (Bullish / Bearish / Neutral)  
- Suggested Position (LONG / SHORT / HOLD)  
- Key Support & Resistance Levels  
- Confidence Score + Reasoning Summary  
Acts as the analytical core of the workflow ‚Äî powering intelligent insights.

### Telegram Message Composer  
Formats AI analysis output into a clear Telegram message.  
Message includes:
- Timeframes analyzed (1m, 5m, 1h)  
- Sentiment Summary  
- Recommended Position  
- Confidence Score  
This ensures traders receive actionable insights directly on Telegram in a clean format.

### Telegram Market Broadcast  
Sends the AI-generated market summary to your Telegram channel or chat.  
Acts as a periodic Solana market report sent automatically every hour.  
Requires:
- Telegram Bot Token  
- Chat ID  
Ideal for traders or teams who want frequent data-driven market insights without checking charts.

## AI-Powered Solana Multi-Timeframe Market Analyzer with Telegram Integration  

### Try It Out!  
A fully automated Solana (SOL/USDT) market intelligence workflow that merges multi-timeframe analysis, AI decision logic, and Telegram delivery.  
Runs hourly to provide up-to-date AI insights directly to your Telegram chat.

### How It Works  
1. Schedule Trigger starts analysis every hour.  
2. Fetches live market data from Crypto Compare.  
3. AI processes multiple timeframes for sentiment & strategy.  
4. Composes a professional Telegram summary message.  
5. Sends it automatically to your Telegram channel.  

### How to Use  
- Import into n8n workspace.  
- Configure Crypto Compare API Key and Telegram credentials.  
- Adjust analysis frequency in the Schedule Trigger node.  
- Deploy and activate to start receiving AI-powered updates.

### (Optional) Extend This Workflow  
- Add confidence-based alerts (only send if Confidence > 80%).  
- Include ETH/USDT and BTC/USDT pairs for comparative insights.  
- Store hourly AI reports to Google Sheets or Notion for backtesting.  
- Integrate with AFK Crypto APIs to transition from analyzer ‚Üí trader.  

### Requirements  
- Crypto Compare API Key  
- Telegram Bot Token + Chat ID  
- n8n Instance with HTTP Request, AI, and Telegram nodes enabled  

### APIs Used  
- GET https://min-api.cryptocompare.com/data/v2/histominute  
- GET https://min-api.cryptocompare.com/data/v2/histohour  

### Summary  
The **AI-Powered Solana Multi-Timeframe Market Analyzer with Telegram Integration** transforms raw market data into intelligent, hourly insights delivered straight to Telegram.  
Built for traders who want real-time AI-driven clarity without executing trades ‚Äî a pure analytical powerhouse for Solana market monitoring.
